official_title: A resolution to direct the President to enter into negotiations with the U.S.S.R. relating to limiting military deployments in the Persian Gulf and the Indian Ocean.

summary.text: Directs the President to enter into negotiations with the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics relating to limiting military deployments in the Persian Gulf and the Indian Ocean. Requires the President to report to Congress on the status of discussions with the Soviet Union prior to the submission of any further request for authority to develop American facilities at Diego Garcia.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the President to enter into negotiations with the U.S.S.R. relating to limiting military deployments in the Persian Gulf and the Indian Ocean.
